panels.description: Tracks recent unacknowledged server issues under maintenance, filtering by severity and host group.
panels.title: DETECTION

panels.description: Displays disk read speeds per second for selected hosts, vital for assessing server file system performance.
panels.title: LECTURE DISQUES DURS $Host

panels.description: Monitors disk write operations per second on selected servers, assessing performance-related metrics for maintenance purposes.
panels.title: ECRITURES DISQUES DURS $Host

panels.description: Monitors and displays the average disk read queue length per host to assess server read performance issues.
panels.title: FILE ATTENTE LECTURE  $Host

panels.description: Tracks the average disk write queue length for specified server hosts, helping to monitor and optimize server disk performance.
panels.title: FILE ATTENTE ECRITURES  $Host

panels.description: Displays the amount of free disk space on drive C for selected hosts to monitor server storage capacity.
panels.title: ESPACE DISQUE LIBRE C  $Host

panels.description: Monitors free disk space on drive D for each server host to ensure adequate storage availability and prevent issues related to disk space exhaustion.
panels.title: ESPACE DISQUE LIBRE D  $Host

panels.description: Tracks the count of active tasks on a specified host within a server group, highlighting system load and operational demands.
panels.title: NOMBRE TACHES $Host

panels.description: Tracks the number of processes running on selected servers, highlighting critical levels for efficient server maintenance.
panels.title: PROCESSUS $Host

panels.description: Monitors overall network activity including bits received and sent for specific hosts, using data from a Zabbix source.
panels.title: ACTIVITE RESEAU GLOBALE $Host

list.definition: SELECT name FROM zabbix.hstgrp WHERE WHERE team = '${team:raw}'
list.name: groupsql
list.query: SELECT name FROM zabbix.hstgrp WHERE WHERE team = '${team:raw}'
